sessions.description: Get ready to mix, mingle, and ignite ideas! Join us for curated bites, crafted drinks, and lively conversation as we launch FUSION. Meet the trailblazers redefining the future of agentic AI and automation—this is your chance to connect, be inspired, and celebrate innovation.

sessions.title: The Path to Impact: Igniting Agentic AI Possibilities
sessions.room: Upper Level, Keynote Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Ben Fiechtner (Keynote)
sessions.description: Join Ben Fiechtner, President of the Americas, as he sets the stage for FUSION with a dynamic preview of what's in store over the next two days.

sessions.title: UiPath Vision of an Agentic World
sessions.room: Upper Level, Keynote Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Daniel Dines (Keynote); Rajat Kalia (Speaker); Aaron White (Speaker); Oliver Pfeil (Speaker)
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description: In this keynote, UiPath CEO and Co-Founder Daniel Dines unveils a bold vision for an agentic future—where autonomous AI agents, robots, and people are orchestrated with governance and control to transform how work gets done and deliver enterprise-scale ROI.

sessions.title: Getting the Most from Agentic Automation Now
sessions.room: Upper Level, Keynote Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Graham Sheldon (Keynote); Raghu Malpani (Keynote)
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description: Join UiPath Chief Product Officer Graham Sheldon and UiPath Chief Technology Officer Ragu Malpani as they share how organizations are already deploying agentic automation to solve real business challenges—unlocking value today with AI-powered agents, reusable components, and enterprise-grade orchestration.

sessions.title: The Agent Experience
sessions.room: Upper Level, Keynote Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Place Holder5 (Keynote)
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description: Craig Le Clair shares his view of agentic automation, enabled by AI agents, as a significant shift that will reshape enterprise workflow automation and potentially lead to hypergrowth. He’ll discuss findings and implications of the agent experience (AX) derived from new research and his new book, “Random Acts of Automation.”

sessions.title: Lunch and Hosted Roundtable Topic Discussions
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description:
Join us in the Lafite Ballroom for a seated lunch paired with interactive roundtable discussions led by industry peers. These expert-hosted conversations are designed to spark fresh ideas and insightful dialogue around the future of agentic AI and automation. 

Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available upon request.

sessions.title: Accelerate the Agentic Enterprise with Agentic Testing Keynote
sessions.speaker: Gerd Weishaar (Speaker); Ingo Philipp (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This keynote introduces the latest Test Cloud and shows how agentic testing weaves quality through the entire development process. Designed for business and technical leaders, we will clarify what is new, why it matters, and where to start. We will highlight capabilities such as performance testing, Studio Web for software testing, self-healing automation, autonomous testing, and Autopilot in Test Manager, and point you to the right follow-on sessions for deeper guidance. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Transform Enterprise Business Processes Keynote
sessions.speaker: Arun Mehta (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This keynote connects Process Intelligence with Maestro to show how organizations move from seeing how work really flows to coordinating action at scale. We will spotlight what is new, why it matters for outcomes across teams, and where leaders should start.

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Unlock Data for Powerful Agentic Automation​ Keynote
sessions.speaker: Alexandru Roman (Speaker); Gunter Desouter (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This keynote explains how API Workflows and Data Fabric provide governed access to systems and unify live data so agents, robots, and people can act together. We will frame the strategy, share the updates, and outline where to begin. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Meet the Experts
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, Cristal Ballroom 1-4
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description:
Step into the Agentic Arena — where innovation meets expertise.
Discover how agentic automation is reshaping the future of work, guided by the sharpest minds in AI transformation. UiPath and our top-tier partners will be there to dive into your toughest questions, explore your biggest challenges, and share insights you won't hear anywhere else.

sessions.title: Accelerate the Agentic Enterprise Keynote
sessions.speaker: Mark Geene (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This keynote outlines how Agents, IXP, packaged Solutions, and Governance and Trust work together to deliver agentic outcomes at enterprise scale. We will clarify the product direction, the updates that matter, and the first steps to take, with a clear view of how guardrails, data protection, and unified audit provide confidence and control. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Accelerate the Agentic Enterprise with Performance Testing
sessions.speaker: Patrick Wolf (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Explore how to measure the performance of your applications by running load, spike, endurance, and stress test scenarios at scale. Learn how to leverage existing automated tests, serverless cloud resources, and on-prem bots to proactively uncover and fix bottlenecks—before they impact your customers. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: 25.10 Test Cloud Feature Spotlight
sessions.speaker: Lev Kushnir (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Test Cloud just got some major upgrades. Get a first look at Studio Web for app testing, self-healing test automation, and autonomous manual testing. See how live streaming and recording add new visibility to your test execution—and explore even more features designed to accelerate quality at scale. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

You will see how to move from an idea to a running workflow with the right triggers, secure connections, and repeatable patterns.

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.description:

Designed for business and technical leaders, we will clarify what is new, why it matters, and where to start. sessions.description:
Unlock the power of AI agents—whether low-code or coded—tailored to your unique software testing needs. Explore a range of real-world examples showing how AI agents tackle diverse testing challenges, then take a deep dive into one: generating compliant synthetic test data for highly regulated industries.

sessions.description:
From risk to confidence

Building on the keynote, this session explains how governance capabilities let you deploy and manage agentic automation with control and enterprise-grade oversight. We will cover out-of-the-box and custom guardrails, PII in-flight masking, and Unified Audit. Designed for business and technical leaders, we will clarify what is new, why it matters, and where to start. You will see how to set policies, protect sensitive data, and investigate activity through grounded demos.

sessions.title: Accelerate the Agentic Enterprise with SAP Testing
sessions.speaker: Lev Kushnir (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Make your move to SAP S/4HANA faster, safer, and smarter. Harness agentic AI and data-driven risk-based testing to automate and continuously validate business-critical processes. Learn from real-world examples how to cut migration risk and keep your SAP landscape stable every step of the way. 

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Unlock Data for Powerful Agentic Automation with Connector Builder
sessions.description:
From gaps to connections

Building on the keynote, this session explains how Connector Builder lets you create secure, custom connectors for APIs that aren’t in the catalog—so agents, robots, and people can act together across systems from a single platform. We’ll clarify what it is, when to use it, and where to start, then show how those connectors surface as activities in Studio for use across your automations.

Pre-Requisites: 

 Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation with UiPath Agent Builder
sessions.room: Upper Level, How-To Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Mateus Salomao (Speaker)
sessions.description: WEX Inc. used UiPath’s low-code Agent Builder to transform contact center operations by automating email-based service requests, particularly around denied claims. Emails are classified with UiPath Communications Mining, then passed to AI agents and workflows that extract context, identify denial reasons, and generate draft responses. Orchestrated via UiPath Maestro, this solution reduces average handle time (AHT), improves customer satisfaction (CSAT), and is positioned to save over $1M annually. In this session, WEX shares how they built and deployed these agents, the orchestration between humans, robots, and agents, and lessons learned in scaling agentic automation across functions like AML reporting and customer profiling.

sessions.title: Orchestrating Outcomes: How Cross-Industry Early Movers Are Scaling Agentic Automation
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Janette Hausler (Moderator); Pkistner  (Speaker); Neil Kalmes (Speaker)
sessions.description: Across industries, organizations are moving from fragmented automation efforts to connected, outcome-focused systems of work. In this session, hear how early mover leaders zeroed in on high-impact use cases, orchestrated complex workflows, and delivered real business value along the way. From reconciling invoices to auditing contracts, they’re turning to the combination of agents, robots, and people so they can scale faster, smarter, and with purpose.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation with UiPath Coded Agents (Python)
sessions.room: Upper Level, How-To Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Daniela Rosenstein (Speaker)
sessions.description: Cato Networks implemented agentic automation with UiPath Coded Agents (Python) to transform customer support operations. By automating the classification of inbound Zendesk tickets and autonomously resolving common inquiries, Cato reduced resolution times, minimized manual work, and improved consistency across responses — directly enhancing the customer experience. This session explores how they built their coded agent, the challenges encountered, and lessons learned while deploying an automation that touches customers at scale.

sessions.title: The Agentified Contact Center: How WEX, Southern California Edison, and Evergen Are Elevating Customer Experience
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Bob Sacunas (Moderator); Emily Krohne (Speaker); Cmiranda  (Speaker); Alfred Ochoa (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Customers today expect fast, personalized answers. Industry leaders like WEX, SCE, and Evergen are showing how agentic automation helps make that possible in the contact center—each in their own way. From accelerating email replies in financial services, to guiding agents through complex utility billing conversations, to matching patients with donor tissue faster in healthcare, they’re finding smarter ways to meet rising expectations.




Join the session to hear their stories, lessons learned, and ideas you can run with to unlock insights and scale success for your customers.

sessions.title: Automating Document-Centric Business Processes
sessions.room: Upper Level, How-To Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Thach Nguyen (Speaker)
sessions.description: HUB International is using UiPath IXP (Intelligent Xtraction & Processing) to streamline document-centric workflows at scale. This session outlines how IXP can be applied to high-volume intake, classification, extraction, validation, and downstream automation, and how HUB is approaching an enterprise-grade rollout. We’ll cover the target processes, the build approach with IXP, orchestration with robots and humans-in-the-loop, and lessons learned.

sessions.title: Two Paths to Agentic Automation: Strategies and Insights from Clorox and UiPath
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Dana Forfa (Speaker); Zeth Baker (Speaker)
sessions.description: This joint session brings together two leading brands to explore a shared playbook for building and scaling agentic automation. While Clorox and UiPath began their journeys from different starting points—one focused on creating a governance-driven blueprint for expansion, the other on executing high-impact use cases—both have applied the same core principles: thoughtful use case selection, strong governance, measurable outcomes, and a vision for enterprise-wide adoption. Together, they will share how these principles translate into scalable, well-governed agentic automation programs that drive real business value, offering practical guidance attendees can put into action.

sessions.title: Deploying Advanced Conversational Agents with UiPath
sessions.room: Upper Level, How-To Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Vanitha Preston (Speaker)

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: UiPath Community Developer Playground​
sessions.track: AI Agents,Agentic Solutions,Agentic Orchestration,Agentic Testing,Best-in-Class Automation,Data & Integrations,Deployment Flexibility,Intelligent Document Processing (IDP),Unified Management, Governance & Security,Unified Management,Governance & Security
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description:
In this open lab you will explore UiPath Playground, a curated environment of vertical and horizontal solutions powered by Agent Builder, Maestro, Studio Web, and Orchestrator. Set your own pace as you dive into complete solutions, then step into UiPath Labs to customize and extend them. Product experts are available throughout to answer questions, unblock issues, and share best practices.

What to Expect: 

•Explore curated solutions in Playground and see core services working together in real scenarios
•Customize a solution in UiPath Labs with guided examples and optional templates
•Get hands on support from product experts and collaborate with peers as you build
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Cross-Industry Panel Discussions: Orchestrating People, Strategy and Technology to Amplify ROI
sessions.track: AI Agents,Agentic Solutions,Agentic Orchestration,Agentic Testing,Best-in-Class Automation,Data & Integrations,Deployment Flexibility,Intelligent Document Processing (IDP),Unified Management,Governance & Security
sessions.speaker: Caleb Jones (Speaker); Bob Sacunas (Speaker); Siddharth Shah (Speaker); Vinay Gangidi (Speaker); Wykita Riley (Speaker); Matt Dussling (Speaker); Aaron Goodrich (Speaker); Flosshilda Labrado (Speaker)
sessions.description:
9:00 - Welcome

Join Caleb Jones, UiPath Strategic Engagement Executive, for a brief welcome and introduction of the panel participants ad topic.

9:05 - Breaking Silos: Intelligent Process Optimization 

This panel brings together leaders who’ve transformed operations in finance, legal, and marketing using agentic automation. Hear how they’ve deployed AI-driven solutions that stay compliant and still deliver real ROI in highly regulated spaces. Discover how to spot high-impact opportunities and build unified strategies for end-to-end process transformation.  

9:50 - Break

10:00 - Welcome

10:05 - Seamless CX: The Agentic Customer Journey 

See how top organizations are using agentic automation to reimagine customer experiences. Leaders will share how AI agents are helping personalize interactions, simplify service, and stay one step ahead of customer needs. Learn how they’re combining smart automation with the human touch—and building systems that get better with every interaction.  

10:50 - Break

11:00 - Welcome

11:05 - Intelligent Quality Assurance: The New Rules in Test Automation 

With software complexity on the rise, autonomous AI agents are changing the game in QA. Experts will show how agentic testing strategies bring together human insight and AI speed to boost test coverage and shorten feedback loops. Get practical tips on plugging agentic testing into your CI/CD pipelines and scaling smart testing frameworks that grow with your needs.

sessions.title: FUSION Financial Services Summit: Delivering Transformative Business Value Today
sessions.track: AI Agents,Agentic Solutions,Agentic Orchestration,Agentic Testing,Data & Integrations,Deployment Flexibility,Intelligent Document Processing (IDP),Unified Management,Governance & Security
sessions.speaker: Rajat Kalia (Speaker); Emily Krohne (Speaker); Jairo Quiros (Speaker); Amin Kermali (Speaker); Eric Bouchard (Speaker); Andrea Simpson (Speaker); Paru Puttanna (Speaker); Janna Riggle (Speaker); Andrew Szabo (Speaker); Smriti Gupta (Speaker); James Dickson (Speaker); Eric Streem (Speaker); Betty Kim (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Explore how leading financial services organizations are scaling automation and AI to solve complex challenges and deliver value across the enterprise—without waiting for specialized talent or new infrastructure. This summit dives into real-world examples of how agentic automation delivers measurable outcomes in compliance, customer experience, onboarding, and more. With a full lineup of live demos, candid leadership discussions from your financial services industry peers, and production-ready stories, you’ll leave with clear strategies and proven approaches to accelerate transformation using the resources you already have.

9:00 - Welcome and Housekeeping

Kick off the day with key themes: AI, automation, and transformation in financial services, plus an overview of sessions and how to engage.

9:05 - Tech Showcase: “Orchestrating the Path to Production: Agentic Automation for Scale" 

Guided by Accenture and rooted in demonstrable visual demos: This session will first provide an overview of the changing automation landscape, and then, using a real-world demo, showcase how agentic automation unlocks new possibilities for operational efficiency, customer experience, and compliance in financial services. 

9:35 - Executive Fireside Chat: Built to Scale: Operationalizing AI and Agentic Automation 

A candid conversation on what it takes to scale AI and automation across the enterprise, with lessons in technology alignment, strategy, and execution. 

10:05 - Panel: From RPA to Agentic – Leading the Organizational Shift 

This panel brings together senior automation leaders to share how their organizations are evolving from structured RPA to intelligent, agentic automation. We’ll explore lessons learned, organizational hurdles, and strategic plays that helped them win executive buy-in and drive adoption.

10:35 - Spotlights: Production-Ready Stories 

These 10-minute customer spotlight sessions will highlight real-world, production-grade deployments of agentic automation. Presenters will walk through specific challenges, implementation approaches, and measurable business results. 

11:10 - Commercial Lending QA/QC - Product Launch

11:30 - How are AI and Automation Teams Coming Together 

As AI initiatives gain momentum across financial institutions, many remain siloed from the RPA and automation programs that could help them scale. This session explores how organizations are evolving their operating models to bring AI and automation teams together—eliminating redundancy, accelerating time to value, and delivering unified business impact. 

11:50 - Closing Remarks / Awards 

The final session will tie together key themes from the day—agentic automation, business transformation, and the power of convergence. We’ll reflect on the most resonant insights, acknowledge standout contributions, and preview what comes next for our financial services community.

sessions.title: Healthcare Payer Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Health Plans
sessions.speaker: Jason Bui (Speaker); Bdspicer  (Speaker); Neil Kalmes (Speaker); Dan Deschamps (Speaker); Jayaprakash Padiyar (Speaker); Prasoon Shrivastava (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Payers today are navigating one of the most complex operating environments in healthcare history—balancing rising costs, growing regulatory pressure, and sky-high member expectations. 

It’s clear: outdated systems and fragmented processes can’t keep up.

This year, we introduce the new agentic power grid for payers — a connected, intelligent infrastructure that transforms how payer organizations operate, decide, and serve. Agentic automation is at the heart of this shift: autonomous digital agents that can adapt, optimize, and orchestrate in real time across the payer ecosystem.

At this summit, we bring to life a new kind of operational power — one fueled by:

•Community: A network of forward-thinking payer leaders sharing strategies to manage complexity, improve agility, and deliver better outcomes.
•Content: Bold ideas and real-world success stories that show what happens when payers automate not just tasks, but end-to-end decisions.
•Consultation: Expert guidance to help your organization plug into the agentic grid—simplifying prior auth, accelerating claims, reducing risk, and transforming member experiences.
With the right architecture, organizations are not only modernizing operations but also unlocking rapid, measurable ROI from their investments in agentic automation.

It’s time to plug into a different model for payer operations for precision, scale, and resilience.

Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - The Autonomy Uplink: Where Payers Are Headed with UiPath

We'll kick things off with a high-voltage overview of big ideas and big customer wins. 

9:30 - Live Currents: Payer Voices from the Agentic Grid

Get inspired by payer organizations who are actively building agentic automation programs around major use cases. With solo presentations and a panel of business leaders and automation experts, you'll leave with plenty of energy and insights to power your agentic strategy. 

11:00 - GridOps LIVE: Inside the Agentic Engine

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Healthcare Provider Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Healthcare Providers
sessions.speaker: Phillip Merrell (Speaker); Jennifer Wetzel  (Speaker); Emily Traupman (Speaker); Jenn Roth (Speaker); Joseph Gannuscio (Speaker); Benjamin Reigle (Speaker); Chris Franciskovich (Speaker); Ajay Mansukhani (Speaker); Manal Almaghafi (Speaker); Taylor Zuke (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Provider organizations are under immense pressure — labor shortages, clinician burnout, rising costs, and administrative overload are straining the entire system. To deliver better care and create sustainable operations, we need more than automation. We need intelligence, adaptability, and orchestration.

Welcome to the New Agentic Power Grid for Providers — a dynamic infrastructure powered by intelligent automation that doesn’t just perform tasks but understands context, responds to change, and elevates human potential across clinical and operational workflows.

At this summit, we’re building that grid together — with a focus on:

•Community: A collaborative network of healthcare leaders and changemakers redefining what’s possible in modern care delivery.
•Content: Breakthrough ideas and case studies showing how agentic automation reduces administrative burden, improves throughput, and supports overextended teams.
•Consultation: Direct access to experts who help providers plug into the agentic grid to streamline revenue cycle, enhance care coordination, reduce denials, and drive clinician satisfaction.
More than transformation, this is acceleration — with organizations across the care continuum already achieving fast, measurable ROI on their agentic automation investments.

The future of healthcare isn’t just connected — it’s orchestrated.

 Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - Energy Index: Impact to Care Progress Report

We'll kick off with a high energy readout of the impact of agentic automation on healthcare providers over the last 12 months.

9:30 - Gridlines: Provider Stories That Connect and Scale

Hear from business and technology leaders on how they've used agentic automation to streamline business operations and spark big outcomes. With solo presentations and a dynamic customer panel, you'll walk away engergized, inspired, and ready to tackle your own agentic vision. 

11:30 - Live from the Grid: Real Provider Solutions in Real Time

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Life Sciences Industry Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Life Sciences
sessions.speaker: Carlos Miranda (Speaker); Vanitha Preston (Speaker); Henry Trinh (Speaker); Gita Malladi (Speaker); Kim Kraus (Speaker); Aaron White (Speaker); Roel Bosma (Speaker); Bart Jager (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Life sciences organizations today face a uniquely complex mission: accelerating innovation while navigating global regulation, cost pressure, and rising expectations for safety, speed, and patient outcomes. The old operating model — siloed, manual, and fragmented — is no longer viable.

At this year’s Life Sciences Summit, we introduce the full agentic power grid — not just automation, but a connected infrastructure of people, technology, and intelligence designed to fuel transformation across the entire life sciences value chain.

This grid is built on four dynamic forces:

1.Agentic Automation: Autonomous digital agents that think, act, and optimize in real time across R&D, regulatory, commercial, and supply chain functions.
2.Community: A vibrant network of pioneering customers sharing strategies, solutions, and success stories from the front lines of change.
3.Consultation: Direct access to UiPath experts who help architect intelligent automation for precision, scale, and compliance in regulated environments.
4.Content: Bold, live sessions that go beyond theory — showcasing real systems, real use cases, and measurable outcomes.
Together, these elements form a powerful new model for how life sciences organizations operate — one that moves from static systems to intelligent flow, from isolated teams to orchestrated networks, and from incremental gains to transformative results.

Welcome to the grid — where life sciences power up.

9:00 - Keynote

10:00 - Customer Presentations

11:30 - Customer Panel and Q&A

sessions.title: Manufacturing Industry Summit: Orchestrating the Future of Manufacturing and CPG: Breaking the Industry 3.9 Rut
sessions.track: AI Agents,Agentic Solutions,Agentic Orchestration,Agentic Testing,Best-in-Class Automation,Data & Integrations,Deployment Flexibility,Intelligent Document Processing (IDP),Unified Management,Governance & Security
sessions.speaker: Anthony Delafuente (Speaker); Paul Boris (Speaker); Ronda Walzer (Speaker); Leslie Mccalla (Speaker); Aaron Goodrich (Speaker); Robert Schneider (Speaker); Mioffe  (Speaker); Keith Martin (Speaker); Dhruv Asher (Speaker)
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description:
Manufacturers aren’t experimenting with automation anymore; they’re scaling it. This summit dives into how manufacturing organizations are applying agentic automation and Gen AI to connect operations, boost agility, and drive real results across supply chain, production, and quality. Through live demos, curated panel discussions, and production-ready use cases, you’ll see how teams in manufacturing are reducing downtime, speeding up decision-making, and empowering the workforce. Built for leaders in operations, supply chain, IT, and digital transformation, this summit also offers plenty of chances to connect with peers and UiPath experts.

9:00 - Orchestrating the Future of Manufacturing and CPG 

Welcome

9:05 - State of Manufacturing: Breaking the Industry 3.9 Rut Featuring Love’s Travel Stores

An in-depth analysis of current manufacturing challenges and the industry's position at the crossroads of 3.9 and true Industry 4.0 transformation. See how Love’s is having tremendous success combing test automation with physical robots to test their point-of-sale systems.  

9:30 - Leveraging Automation: See How to Enter the Agentic Space Featuring Conagra Brands

Discover how leading manufacturers are qualifying and implementing agentic programs to break down silos and create unified visibility across operations.  

9:55 - Getting over Your Nerves: First Steps Into Agentic Orchestration, Featuring Wesco Distribution

Practical case studies showcasing how big ideas are becoming reality through intelligent automation.  

More to come

sessions.title: Public Sector Summit: Accelerate Mission Outcomes with Agentic Automation
sessions.speaker: Christopher Radich (Speaker); Pradeep Paruchuri (Speaker); Treasa Hunt (Speaker); Adarryl Roberts (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Public sector organizations are under pressure to modernize services, manage limited resources, and meet increasing demands—all while maintaining accountability and compliance. This summit specially designed for public sector attendees explores how government teams are using agentic automation to improve audit readiness, optimize workforce capacity, and modernize legacy systems without costly overhauls. Through a mix of real-world case studies, actionable insights, and live demonstrations, you’ll see how automation helps agencies deliver faster, smarter, and more resilient public services. Attendees will also have opportunities to connect with peers and speak directly with UiPath experts who understand the unique mission needs of the public sector.

9:00 - UiPath Presentation

9:30 - Customer Spotlight: Nebraska HHS

9:50 - Break

10:05 - Roundtable Sessions

11:15 - UiPath Closing and Networking Power Break

Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available upon request.

sessions.title: Meet the Experts
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, Cristal Ballroom 1-4
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description:
Step into the Agentic Arena — where innovation meets expertise.
Discover how agentic automation is reshaping the future of work, guided by the sharpest minds in AI transformation. UiPath and our top-tier partners will be there to dive into your toughest questions, explore your biggest challenges, and share insights you won't hear anywhere else.

sessions.title: Welcome to Day Two

sessions.description: Join Ben Fiechtner, President of the Americas, as he kicks off our afternoon keynotes exploring the breakthroughs, trends, and bold moves driving the next wave of agentic AI and automation.

sessions.title: The Impact of Enterprise-Wide Agentic Automation
sessions.room: Upper Level, Keynote Theater, Cristal Ballroom 5-8
sessions.level: Contact Center,Finance & Accounting,Human Resources,IT,Legal & Compliance,Sales & Marketing,Supply Chain
sessions.description: AI represents the most transformative General Purpose Technology since the Industrial Revolution, with agentic AI having the potential for automating work across enterprises. Early studies found productivity gains of 15-50% for customer service agents, software engineers, and managers, but these micro-level benefits have not yet translated to economy-wide productivity growth, suggesting we are in the early stages of a “productivity J-curve”. Erik will discuss that, to harness AI, enterprises must more strategically deploy AI tools and agents across business processes and establish better measurement frameworks to identify and quantify their rapidly evolving benefits.

sessions.title: Registration
sessions.description: Check in at registration to unlock your full FUSION experience. Registration is on Level 1, right across from the lounge in the conference area. Want to stay one step ahead? Download the UiPath Events mobile app and get the inside scoop before the action begins.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Agentic Testing Is Here – Meet Test Cloud
sessions.description:
Get hands-on with UiPath Test Cloud and discover how agentic testing is changing the rules of QA. In this interactive lab, you’ll:

•Use Autopilot for Testers to accelerate test case ideation and automation
•Experience conversational test development powered by AI
•Explore Test Data Management to provision, govern, and scale test data
•Build self-healing test automations for apps, mobile, and system migration
•Walk away with your first AI-powered test automation and see how fast you can break the bottleneck.
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Build Enterprise-Grade AI Agents with UiPath, a Low-Code Workshop
sessions.speaker: Zach Eslami (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Bring the power of AI agents to your automation workflows in this hands-on, low-code workshop. Learn the complete agent development lifecycle: discover agents from existing Process Maps or templates, configure prompts and tools, evaluate performance with Agent Score and Autopilot, and deploy as automation workflows. Perfect for automation developers, process analysts, and anyone looking to add AI capabilities to their UiPath solutions—no coding experience required.  

*We are running this workshop twice to ensure attendees can join.

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Build and Deploy Custom Agents with UiPath
sessions.speaker: Eusebiu Jecan (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Package, publish, and deploy python-coded agents with UiPath. In this hands-on workshop, experts will guide attendees through how to get started quickly with UiPath code samples, including ready-to-use code snippets and templates that showcase automation patterns, integrations, and scenarios.

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Data-Driven Agentic Process Optimization with UiPath Process Intelligence
sessions.description:
This hands-on workshop walks you through every stage of implementing Process Intelligence with UiPath. From initial process discovery to analysis, optimization, and continuous monitoring.

Workshop highlights:

•Practical integration experience: Participants will work with a Maestro Process Mining application, layering on additional data sources with a built-in integrated extractor (e.g., Salesforce), and getting full end-to-end process visibility to drive ongoing automation improvements
•Automated process mapping: Learn how to automatically construct process maps using real data and import them into Maestro to kickstart agentic orchestration development
•End-to-end implementation: Learn the complete workflow from data extraction to actionable insights
You'll learn how to:

•Extract valuable insights from your process data to identify bottlenecks and optimization opportunities
•Build comprehensive process maps that visualize your actual workflows
•Implement real-time monitoring dashboards to track KPIs and performance metrics
•Drive data-informed process improvements across your organization
•Enrich agentic processes using Process Intelligence capabilities
•Connect Maestro with external data sources to create a unified view of your business processes
Workshop focus:

We'll focus on enabling you to transform raw process data into actionable insights that drive real business value. By the end, you'll know how to leverage Process Intelligence capabilities to enhance your existing processes without disrupting operations, while maximizing efficiency, compliance, and business outcomes.

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Fuel Your Agents: Build API Automations That Drive Intelligent Action
sessions.speaker: Gunter Desouter (Speaker); Guy Vanwert (Speaker); Eusebiu Jecan (Speaker)
sessions.description:
In this hands-on lab, you’ll learn how to build the invisible infrastructure that makes intelligent agents truly powerful: API automation.

You’ll get to design and deploy API-first or hybrid automations that give agents the ability to trigger actions, retrieve data, and orchestrate decisions across complex enterprise environments. With the help of Integration Service, Data Fabric, and MCP Server, you’ll create serverless, secure, and scalable automations that are instantly callable by agents, robots, or other workflows.

By the end of the session, you’ll walk away knowing how to build API automations to fuel the brains of your automation platform - your agents.

What you’ll learn:

•How agents and robots can use APIs to interact reliably with enterprise systems
•How to design scalable, secure API-first automations using API Workflows
•How to tap into systems fast using prebuilt or custom connectors
•How to give agents real-time access to clean, unified data with Data Fabric
•How to build your own MCP Server using the tools and automations you've used during the lab
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build something agents can use immediately. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Coffee Break
Agentic Labs: Agent Tooling - Unlock Complex and Unstructured Documents with UiPath IXP, a New GenAI Experience
sessions.speaker: Daniel Lerner (Speaker); Erik Bohman (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Increase automation rates, automate more, and extend end-to-end automation across new processes. Get hands-on with UiPath IXP, a multi-modal data classification and extraction experience that unlocks enterprise data. IXP turns all document and communications data into insight and action at speed and scale. This workshop focuses on the new 'Generative extraction for unstructured and complex documents capability'. During this practical session, IXP experts will guide attendees through the end-to-end deployment process — including model building, validation, and deployment. 

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.description:
RPA is entering a new era. Join us to see how UiPath innovations like Healing Agent, ScreenPlay, and Autopilot are reshaping automation into resilient, agent-ready systems that thrive on any machine and any operating system. Discover how modern RPA can self-heal, adapt, and accelerate automation at scale—unlocking new possibilities for intelligent, agentic enterprises.

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Build, Operate, and Optimize Your First Agentic Process
sessions.speaker: Mounish Kothapally (Speaker); Anvita Dekhane (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This hands-on workshop walks you through every stage of creating a working agentic process with UiPath Maestro. From initial process design to deployment, monitoring, and continuous improvement.

You’ll learn how to:

•Model processes that combine multiple agents, people, and automation tools
•Manage live instances and handle escalations
•Monitor performance and identify optimization opportunities
We’ll focus on enabling you to make agents reliable, safe, and scalable in real-world processes. By the end, you’ll know how to integrate agentic capabilities into your existing development workflow without sacrificing control, performance, or maintainability.

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: From Performance to Pipeline – Build Next-Gen Testing Agents
sessions.description:
Take your agentic testing skills to the next level in this advanced lab. You’ll:

•Supercharge your Agentic Testing strategy with load and performance testing
•Leverage Agent Builder to design testing agents that scale across apps and systems to deliver speed, scalability, and nonstop quality
•Incorporate continuous testing directly into your CI/CD pipelines
By the end, you’ll have hands-on experience with performance testing, CI/CD-integrated continuous testing, and building agents with Agent Builder — three essential skills to shape the future of QA.
